basics.name: Ashish Papanai
basics.summary: Machine Learning Scientist with expertise in Computer Vision, Agricultural AI, and Medical Image Analysis. Currently pursuing MSc in Machine Learning at University of T端bingen with ELIZA Master's Scholarship.

work.summary: Leading computer vision projects for agricultural applications
highlights: Developing computer vision models for crop monitoring using Joint Positional Embedding models
Applying MAE (Masked Autoencoder) style pretraining strategies for region-specific pest recognition
Evaluating and fine-tuning Open Source Vision Language Models (VLMs) for agricultural applications
Leading pest monitoring projects with teams of ML analysts and interns

work.summary: Advanced ML model development and deployment for agricultural AI
highlights: Automated image classification model development, reducing development time from 5 hours to under 1 hour
Streamlined ML deployment pipeline, accelerating releases from 5 days to under 1 day
Enhanced model reliability using dataset cartography techniques and Class Activation Maps (CAMs)
Developed and deployed Crop Yield Estimation solution with agronomist-validated feature importance
Advanced CottonAce project with synthetic image generation for national deployment

work.summary: Research on model distillation and optimization techniques
highlights: Developed and evaluated novel model distillation techniques for object detection and counting models
Optimized model performance and efficiency through various distillation strategies
Analyzed and improved cascade models including OOD detectors for edge devices

work.summary: Research on gall bladder cancer detection from ultrasonography images
highlights: Worked under Prof. Chetan Arora and Prof. M. Balakrishnan on MAVI project
Research on gall bladder cancer detection from ultrasonography images
Focus on Vision Transformers explainability, Weakly supervised object detection, and Multiple instance learning

work.summary: Optimization of deep learning models for edge devices
highlights: Optimized deep learning models for scene-text recognition using edge devices
Refactored and upgraded existing models to latest firmware versions (OpenVINO 2022, PyCam 2.0)
Converted and tested VisionLAN to ONNX and OpenVINO IR formats

publications.name: Efficient Prediction of Annual Yield Using Machine Learning Techniques
publications.summary: Research on machine learning approaches for agricultural yield prediction.

publications.name: Hybrid Image Processing Device for Agricultural Applications
publications.summary: Development of hybrid image processing solutions for agricultural monitoring.

publications.name: Vihanced: Video Super-Resolution for Agricultural Monitoring
publications.summary: Advanced video super-resolution techniques for agricultural surveillance systems.

publications.name: Gall Bladder Cancer Detection Using Deep Learning
publications.summary: Deep learning approaches for early detection of gall bladder cancer from ultrasound images.

publications.name: Maintaining User Trust in AI Systems
publications.summary: Research on building and maintaining user trust in AI-powered agricultural systems.

presentations.name: Agricultural AI: From Research to Deployment
presentations.description: Presentation on the journey of agricultural AI projects from research to national deployment.

presentations.name: Computer Vision in Agriculture
presentations.description: Workshop on applying computer vision techniques to agricultural problems.

teaching.description: Conducted workshops on machine learning applications in agriculture for students and professionals.

portfolio.name: CottonAce Project
portfolio.description: National deployment of AI-powered cotton pest monitoring system within National Pest Surveillance System.

portfolio.name: Crop Yield Estimation System
portfolio.description: AI-powered crop yield estimation solution with agronomist-validated feature importance.
